title: Green buds of hope
brief_description: Child welfare facilities in post war Poland; effect of such services on child mortality figures; new baby clinics established in city areas; mobile clinic units, creches, and activities in the country’s 7000 nursery schools, where children receive free medical and dental attention; during vacations, holidays are organized and children from Warsaw and Krakow visit the mountains or the seaside.
